title: Acheron

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Once per game, revive a townie and initiate them into the Coven.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Town Power roles turn into Lunatic Hell Fairy (949)
- Town Investigative roles turn into Synesthesia (478)
- Town Killing roles turn into M-63 Plamen Artillery Piece (299)
- Town Protective roles turn into Thaumaturge (300)
- Town Support roles turn into Augur (428)
- Any other subalignments turn into Bloodbender (903)
- With the Necronomicon, you may use any of the unboosted abilities of the roles above. They function as if you were that role for that night.

desc:
Post 1113
*From the river frontier of the underworld, you shall rise.*
